alerts._comment: SCENARIO A: Systemwide alert (routeId: SMART). Should show to ALL users regardless of selected stations.
alerts.headerText: TRIP #30 NB AND TRIP #34 NB ARE DELAYED UP TO 15 MINUTES
alerts.descriptionText: Trains are holding at Petaluma Downtown due to a mechanical issue.

alerts._comment: SCENARIO B: Stop-specific alert for Larkspur (stopId: 71011). Should show ONLY when the user has Larkspur selected as from or to station.
alerts.headerText: LARKSPUR STATION: ELEVATOR OUT OF SERVICE
alerts.descriptionText: The elevator at Larkspur station is temporarily out of service. Passengers requiring accessibility assistance should contact station staff.

alerts._comment: SCENARIO C: Trip-specific alert (tripId). Per GTFS-RT spec this should target only passengers on that trip. Since trip IDs are per-service-date and can't be correlated client-side, we show this to all users conservatively.
alerts.descriptionText: Trip #37 southbound has been canceled due to a mechanical issue. The next available southbound service is Trip #39 departing Windsor at 18:01.
